description: Claude Haiku 4.5 is Anthropic's ultra-fast, budget-friendly model for everyday tasks. It shares the 200K context and 64K output capacity of Sonnet, but prioritizes low latency and efficiency. Haiku 4.5 is ideal for rapid Q&A, brief document analysis, and high-volume workloads, at just $1/M input and $5/M output tokens. It delivers near-frontier accuracy at lower cost, making it suitable for real-time applications and free tiers. Haiku retains vision and multilingual support, with slightly reduced depth compared to Sonnet to maximize speed.
